Questions.Label: How do you continuously improve the quality of your assessment practice?
Questions.ShortLabel: How do you continuously improve the quality of your assessment practice?

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter how you continuously improve the quality of your assessment practice

Validations.Name: MaxWordCount
Validations.ErrorMessage: How you continuously improve the quality of your assessment practice must be 500 words or less

Questions.Label: Engagement with trailblazers and employers
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
Give evidence of engagement with trailblazers and employers to demonstrate your organisation's occupational competence to assess [StandardName].

Your evidence must demonstrate your organisation's relevant experience of working with employers or working in the specific occupational area.

Your evidence must not be over three years old and must not relate to the development and implementation of qualifications.

You should give answers that relate to the assessment plan for the standard you are applying for.

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter your evidence of engagement with trailblazers and employers

Validations.Name: MaxWordCount
Validations.ErrorMessage: Evidence of engagement with trailblazers and employers must be 500 words or less

Questions.Label: Give details of membership of professional organisations
Questions.QuestionBodyText: Give details of why this supports best practice and skills for this assessment plan. Show how it demonstrates your competence to assess this standard.

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter details of membership to professional organisations

Validations.Name: MaxWordCount
Validations.ErrorMessage: Details of membership to professional organisations must be 500 words or less

Questions.Label: How many assessors will you have?
Questions.Hint: This should include invigilators where the end-point assessment is an examination

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Provide the number of assessors your organisation has

Questions.Label: How many end-point assessments do you expect to deliver annually?

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter the volume of end-point assessments you will be able to deliver

Questions.Label: How will the volume of end-point assessments be achieved with the number of assessors you will have?
Questions.ShortLabel: How will the volume of end-point assessments be achieved with the number of assessors you will have?

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter how the volume of end-point assessments will be achieved

Validations.Name: MaxWordCount
Validations.ErrorMessage: How the volume of end-point assessments will be achieved must be 500 words or less

Questions.Label: How do you recruit and train assessors?
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
All assessors must be qualified to undertake assessments in line with the requirements laid out in the assessment plan.

They must have expertise and experience in designing and developing assessment products and tools where this is a requirement of the assessment plan.

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter how you recruit and train assessors

Validations.Name: MaxWordCount
Validations.ErrorMessage: How you recruit and train assessors must be 500 words or less

Questions.Label: What experience, skills and qualifications do your assessors have?
Questions.QuestionBodyText: You need to give examples of how, when and where the assessor have demonstrated their capability. Assessors must have current and relevant occupational and assessment experience. Give details, evidence and context of this experience for all assessors.

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter the experience, skills and qualifications your assessors have

Validations.Name: MaxWordCount
Validations.ErrorMessage: Details of experience, skills and qualifications must be 500 words or less

Questions.Label: How will you ensure your assessors' occupational expertise is maintained and kept current?
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
Give examples, of up to 500 words, for current professional development and recent experience of where and how they have demonstrated their suitability.

Give details, evidence and context for this experience, for the assessors you have now or will have in place by the time you start delivery.

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter how you ensure your assessors' occupational expertise is maintained

Validations.Name: MaxWordCount
Validations.ErrorMessage: How occupational expertise is maintained must be 500 words or less

Questions.Label: How will you deliver an end-point assessment for this standard?

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter how you will deliver an end-point assessment for this standard

Validations.Name: MaxWordCount
Validations.ErrorMessage: How you will deliver an end-point assessment must be 500 words or less

Questions.Label: Do you intend to outsource any of your end-point assessments?

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter the quality assurance of outsourced services

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Select yes if you intend to outsource any of your end-point assessments
